description: Try our easy to follow Pork Loin Cutlets with Mango Avocado Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork cutlet,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,BBQ,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Mango,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork Loin Cutlets with Mango Avocado Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 avocado, stone removed, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mango, avocado, tomato, shallots and lime juice in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Season pork cutlets with salt and pepper.
Heat a BBQ hotplate on medium. Cook cutlets for 4 minutes on each side.
Serve cutlets with salsa and greens.
